headline: Why Income Investors See McCormick & Company (MKC) as a Reliable Choice Among Food Dividend Stocks
summary: McCormick & Company, Incorporated (NYSE:MKC) is included among the 14 Best Food Dividend Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. McCormick & Company, Incorporated (NYSE:MKC), the company behind household names like Frank’s Red Hot and Cholula hot sauces, is facing a tricky market but seems to be handling it carefully. Its second-quarter results were modest, yet […]
